F

F2 - Static variable in class camzup.core.Simplex
Squish constant 2D (Math.sqrt(3.0) - 1.0) / 2.0; approximately 0.3660254180431366f .
F3 - Static variable in class camzup.core.Simplex
Squish constant 3D (Math.sqrt(4.0) - 1.0) / 3.0; approximately 0.3333333432674408f .
F4 - Static variable in class camzup.core.Simplex
Squish constant 4D (Math.sqrt(5.0) - 1.0) / 4.0; approximately 0.30901700258255005f .

fract(float) - Static method in class camzup.core.Utils
Finds the signed fractional portion of the input value by subtracting the value's truncation from the value, i.e., fract ( a ) := a - trunc ( a ) .

Use this instead of fmod ( a, 1.0 ) or a % 1.0 .
fract(Vec2, Vec2) - Static method in class camzup.core.Vec2
